name: Chaos (itch) (jerryc05, HanL)
description:
Description:

Chaos is a 2D adventure platform game designed in traditional Chinese aesthetics. 

Four ancient creatures put the world in chaos. You, as a young Taoist, will learn to employ four powers from nature (wood, earth, water, and fire) to solve puzzles, defeat the creatures, and bring back peace to humanity.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Switch States: 1,2,3,4,5

Fire: Left Click

Talk to NPC: E (when nearby)

Credits:

JADECat Studio

  • Jerry (Ziyan) Chen

  • David (Xiaoyang) Song
